forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. West wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 41, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts a golden hue over Downtown San Francisco, the air feels crisp yet invigorating, flirting with the cooler temperatures that accompany the afternoon. Today's forecast paints a picture of clear blue skies, as the city basks in a sunlit embrace, perfect for those looking to savor the essence of an urban winter day. Temperatures may dip slightly as the afternoon progresses, inviting an unhurried pace. Tonight, tranquility reigns as the skies remain predominantly clear, with a coolness settling in—a gentle reminder of winter's presence. 

The likelihood of fog or a marine layer is minimal, allowing for delightful views across the bay, ideal for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet afternoon visit to a cozy café. Dressing in layers is advisable; a warm jacket layered over a sweater will keep you comfortable as you transition from the bustling energy of the day into the peaceful evening. In this serene setting, one might find satisfaction in simply observing the world from a park bench or indulging in a book while the daylight begins to fade softly into dusk.
